background: In the given task, you are expected to use AWS Cloud Development Kit (CDK) with Python to define and provision AWS cloud infrastructure using familiar programming constructs. The challenge ensures a practical grasp of real-world AWS service integration needed for scalable, secure, and well-monitored cloud environments.
aws_services: VPC, EC2, Auto Scaling Group, Lambda, CloudWatch (Alarms, Logs, Metrics), EventBridge, IAM (Roles, Policies, Instance Profiles), SSM (Systems Manager), NAT Gateway, Internet Gateway, Route Tables, Security Groups, Launch Template
